1.0.name: wordpress/freetobook-booking-button
1.0.description:
The freetobook plugin is ideal for accommodation providers looking to add online booking functionality to their wordpress website. You can choose to have a booking form where your customer enters dates or a simple booking button, both are linked to your rates and availability which you can update on freetobook.

To find out more and register for an account simply visit our website. Please be aware that the freetobook plugin is only suitable for accommodation providers, do not register if you are not an accommodation provider.
